name: Harry Potter
description: The Boy Who Lived, the main protagonist of the series.

name: Hermione Granger
description: One of Harry's best friends, known for her intelligence and resourcefulness.

name: Ron Weasley
description: Harry's loyal friend, from a large and loving wizarding family.

name: Severus Snape
description: Potions Master and a complicated character who played a key role in Harry's story.

name: Albus Dumbledore
description: The wise and powerful headmaster of Hogwarts.
